name: Halo Waypoint
description:
Halo Waypoint is an official website dedicated to the Halo franchise. It features the information about the games, multiple FAQs, guides, tutorials, and media content. Via Waypoint you can monitor your progress in Halo titles and get extra in-game awards.

Halo Waypoint is divided into several sections and not only provides you with the latest news on the franchise but allows to communicate with other players on Forum and purchase Halo merchandise. In fact, it’s the most complete resource of the information on Halo every player can use to stay tuned on the series’ updates.
